form:
Creates a project for developing multi-bundle Amdatu Mongo/REST components. The following dependencies are added to the build path:
OSGi Core
OSGi Compendium
Apache Felix Dependency Manager
Amdatu Mongo
Mongo Java Driver
Mongo Jackson Mapper
Jackson Core
Jackson Mapper
Jackson BSON
Servlet API
Amdatu REST Docs
Amdatu JAX-RS
Amdatu Token Provider
